verses.name: Lamentations 3:1
verses.text: I am the man that hath seen affliction by the rod of his wrath.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:2
verses.text: He hath led me, and brought me into darkness, but not into light.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:3
verses.text: Surely against me is he turned; he turneth his hand against me all the day.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:4
verses.text: My flesh and my skin hath he made old; he hath broken my bones.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:5
verses.text: He hath builded against me, and compassed me with gall and travail.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:6
verses.text: He hath set me in dark places, as they that be dead of old.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:7
verses.text: He hath hedged me about, that I cannot get out: he hath made my chain heavy.
